|cpu1_cspeed=333 MHz |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 MiB |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=25Q16BVSIG |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 MiB |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9864G6IH-6 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, J102,, (115200,8,N,1) |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5355A1;BCM5355A1KFBG, CA0936 P11, 934824 N1A; |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=none |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=CFE;;vendor modified; |stock_os=SuperTask!; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=Belkin_G_Wireless_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Belkin_G_Wireless_[0-9A-F]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=94:44:52 |oui_eth=94:44:52 |default_ch= }} {{TagLine|G Wireless Router}}
{{SupportPage|vendor=Belkin|vs_id_old=387}} "P/N: 141700520016J R01" is silkscreened on the board. Per the below boot log, BCM5355 is presumed to be quite similar (if not identical) to BCM5356. The default SSID is '''Belkin_XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' is the last 3 octets of the WLAN MAC address (w/ uppercase letters). ==Additional external links== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Known_incompatible_devices On the '''DD-WRT''' Wiki's ''Known incompatible devices table''] ==Images== File:Belkin F5D7234-4 v5 board top 2.jpg|board top File:Belkin F5D7234-4 v5 board top shield removed.jpg|board top, shield removed File:Belkin F5D7234-4 v5 cpu.jpg|CPU ===scans=== File:Belkin F5D7234-4 v5 board top.jpg|board top File:Belkin F5D7234-4 v5 board bot.jpg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] ==Serial== ===Pinout=== 
<---- to BCM5355A1
                J102
       (GND) (RxD) (TxD) [3.3]
